Text:
also supports OS systems , Linux, macs, etc..supports a lot of OS. even has a emulator for Xbox 360.
If you guys have issues finding the emulator your looking for, let me know. I will upload all of them for you guys :)
Thanks for this up!! I can't get any of the marvel vs games to work, says there's missing rom or chd files, is there a bios I need or something?
Never mind! Was using 148u5 works perfectly on 148! Thanks again, amazing up!!!!
Also it could have been because I forgot to run ./mame -cc for my sdlmame. Sorry for blowin up your comments, again, thanks, me and my kid had a blast on this.

Awesome..I am really glad to hear it..yeah all the bios is included with the roms. :) glad to hear you guys had a blast. i always update them and if i get enough people asking for chd's and laser discs, i can always make that happen as well :) Take care friend and Enjoy.
